overview: How does Rhonda satisfy her burning desires when you’re not there? What do Taija and Susan do when they’re all alone? What fantasies drive Heather in her self-fulfillment? How does Gina spend her most intimate moments? They’ll gladly show you, but all the while they’ll be… wishing you were here!
tagline: For those who wish to be alone with their favorite starlet...
title: Wish You Were Here
